[1]: https://brettterpstra.com/reorder

This is the [first](https://example.com/first) link.

Links should [be converted](https://example.com/converted) to [numeric](https://brettterpstra.com/numeric) references.

- Links inside
  - Nested list [items](https://example.com/items)
  - Should be placed [outside](https://brettterpstra.com/outside)
- The top level list
- Links that are [repeated](https://brettterpstra.com/numeric) should reference their previous occurence.

Existing [reference links][1] should be re-numbered in sequence.

> Links inside of
> > Nested block quotes [should appear]
> > After the parent blockquote
> > And id-less links should be converted

[should appear]: https://example.com/nested-blockquote
